long.am,ar,bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,es,fa,fi,f: Simple Formal Messaging App that enables people and businesses to chat.
long.bn,en,en_AU,en_US,es_419,et,fil,gu,he,id: Reachus is an instant messaging app that makes People and Business Chat easier. People simply add a new chat by entering a business handle (i.e @businessname) or make use of the search box. Businesses get an handle by simply creating an account online (www.reachus.im) and setting up their profile, status, channels and representatives' account. Business representatives login via the APP. There is also a desktop App for businesses that want their representatives to login on desktop. Please visit www.reachus.im to reserve your handle. IT'S FREE!!!.
